ExecutiveSummary.one_line: Conflict-managed drought allocation strategy balancing rights, ecology, and essential uses.

bullets.item: Drought stage triggers with proportional curtailment and exemptions.
Ecological flow floors with adaptive management and audits.
Enforcement toolkit with graduated penalties and appeals.

SynthesizedConclusion.KeyFinding: Stage-based curtailment honoring senior rights with negotiated offsets.
Urban essential-use tiers with leakage reduction and reuse incentives.
SynthesizedConclusion.RiskAssessment: Maintain ecological flow floors; trigger habitat restoration funds.
